
{{Client function}}


{{New feature/item|3.0150|1.5.0|7048|
This function sets the radius for a [[/Element/Light.md|light]] element.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool setLightRadius ( Light theLight, float radius )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/light.md|light]]:setRadius|radius|getLightRadius}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theLight:''' The [[/Element/Light.md|light]] that you wish to set the radius of.

=== Returns ===
Returns ''true'' if the function was successful, ''false'' otherwise.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
local light = createLight(0, 2, 3, 4)
addCommandHandler("setradiusoflight",
	function(cmd, radius)
		if radius then
			if tonumber(radius) > 0 then
				setLightRadius(light, tonumber(radius))
			else
				outputChatBox("Radius must be greater than 0.")
			end
		else
			outputChatBox("You must specify a radius.")
		end
	end
)</syntaxhighlight>
